original_text: And they stirred up the people and the elders and the scribes, and they came upon him and seized him and brought him before the council,
korean_text: 백성과 장로와 서기관들을 충동시켜 와서 잡아가지고 공회에 이르러

sentences.original_text: And they stirred up the people and the elders and the scribes
and brought him before the council
